theme: Jess just discovered that her boyfriend, Mark, has been texting another girl in secret. She found a series of flirty messages and is furious. Sheâ€™s texting her best friend, Sarah, to vent and seek advice, right after confronting Mark. Things are explosive and she needs support.

participant1.name: Jess
participant1.personality: Passionate and dramatic, she uses lots of emojis and exclamation points. Feels things intensely and often overreacts.

participant2.name: Sarah
participant2.personality: Level-headed and calm, Sarah is a good listener. She texts in a straightforward manner, using more thoughtful responses.
